results.name: If n = k-th prime power then k else 0.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: a095874 n | y == n    = length xs + 1
(PARI) a(n)=if(isprimepower(n), sum(i=1,logint(n,2), primepi(sqrtnint(n,i)))+1, n==1) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 29 2015
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 10 2004
